title: Stopping At Place Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Stopping At Place Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Stopping At Place Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 216
items.arabic: ((أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ)).
